org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.mux

Class QueueMuxScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.oodt.cas.resource.mux.QueueMuxScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Scheduler

    public class QueueMuxScheduler
extends Object
implements Scheduler
    This scheduler multiplexes between multiple schedulers based on the "queue" .

    $Revision$
